eu.amidst.flinklink.core.learning.parametric

Class ParallelVB

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.flinklink.core.learning.parametric.ParallelVB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm, ParameterLearningAlgorithm, Serializable

    public class ParallelVB
extends Object
implements BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm, Serializable
    This class implements the ParameterLearningAlgorithm interface, and defines the parallel Maximum Likelihood algorithm.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#pmlexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
